#summary Describes how to write patterns used in targeting by URL, referrer and dynamic parameters.

= Using Patterns =
We currently support 2 special pattern symbols:

{{{*}}} - for any sequence of symbols

{{{_}}} - for any single symbol


== Examples == 
|| *Pattern* || *Matches* ||
|| *soft.com* || http://adserversoft.com, http://microsoft.com ||
|| http://adserversoft.com?ref=23_ || http://adserversoft.com?ref=23a, http://adserversoft.com?ref=234 ||
